Name: Freezy Frost
Effect: Single Target. Low Accuracy 1. Remove all Increased or Reduced Attributes and Traits the Target may have. If the User of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this Move fails.
Description: The user touches its foe while playing 'Freeze!'. Surprisingly, the foe becomes frozen in a block of ice. Once they realize they were just playing pretend, the ice dissolves into haze.
